author: Epic Games
description:
The action-RPG video game is the sequel to the cult classic Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines. Vampire: the Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 lets players step into its story through two distinct, alternating perspectives: Elder vampire Phyre and Malkavian detective Fabien. 

Pre-purchase now: https://epic.gm/vtm-bloodlines2

Today, we bring you a new glimpse into the Learned Clan. Meet the Brujah characters of Seattle and see Phyre's fists in action. 

Brujah starts with "Celerity", "Presence", and "Potence" as clan affinities, and "Brutality" as the passive ability. Then, as the game progresses, you'll be able to unlock the following Brujah disciplines:

"Taunt": Compel and opponent to attack you and drop their weapon if armed. 
"Lightning Strike": Unleash an unstoppable hail of punches. 
"Charge": Surge forward, grabbing an enemy and using them as a battering ram. "Earthshock": Slam the ground with explosive force, flinging enemies into the air. 
"Spark of Rage" - Clan Perk: Killing ene
title: Vampire: The Masquerade – Bloodlines 2 | Brujah Clan Trailer
